mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discuss( bookId, pointId, cardId, content, createTime, userId, username )VALUES( #{bookId}, #{pointId}, #{cardId}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{username} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM discuss WHERE id=#{discussId} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from discuss t where t.bookId=#{bookId} and t.pointId is NULL OR t.pointId='' and t.cardId is NULL OR t.cardId=''
